A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: More than anything\, this movie's reviews show the power Disney has over critics and controlling the narrative around their movies. I had dismissed the complaints of DC fans saying the critics were biased against them and toward Disney/Marvel\, if only because the DC movies have been pretty bad. Now I have to wonder. This tomatometer score may be the best evidence for why Disney should not be allowed to buy Fox\, that is an absurd sentence (which makes me like it even more).
